markdownRemark.html:
I really like the idea to embed a chart in the makedown with a very simple and readable syntax. And gatsby already have a plugin for it. gatsby-remark-graph

This is a test chart with mermaid plugin.

graph LR A[Start] -- Links To --> B((Circle)) A --> C(Round Rect) B --> D{End} C --> D
graph LR TDD[Test Driven Development] -- Links To --> B((Circle)) TDD --> C(Round Rect) B --> D{End} C --> D

next.excerpt: Writing things down is always a good thing. Especially when you are solving a difficult problem. You need to analyze the problem, and digest your solution then come up with something. This is why I want to reboot this blog.
